name: Jukebox
description: A simple song manager for Geometry Dash

issues.info: For any issues regarding this mod, send me a message on my discord: 'fleeym'. If you can, please give the level or song ID you are having problems with.

fix-empty-size.name: Fix 0.0B
fix-empty-size.description: Fixes multi asset levels showing 0.0B size (experimental, might cause lag when downloading assets)

autocomplete-metadata.name: Autocomplete metadata
autocomplete-metadata.description: Try to autocomplete song info from metadata when adding. Causes a tiny big of lag after picking a song file.

use-yt-dlp.name: Use yt-dlp
use-yt-dlp.description: Use yt-dlp to download YouTube songs. Disabling uses cobalt.

yt-dlp-path.name: yt-dlp path
yt-dlp-path.description: Path for the yt-dlp binary, used to download songs.
